name: In your coma
description:
In this game your wondering around in a desert and come across a strange object, as a result of it's affect on you, your journey into your mind.

computer  controllers :  

up (arrow up, w) 

down (arrow down, s)

left (arrow left, a)

right(arrow  right , d)

A (alt, z, j)

B (control, k, x) 

start (Enter)

select (shift)
